sentences.en: A spider had spun a perfect web outside the window.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛在窗外结了一张完整的网。

sentences.en: As the nebula collapsed because of its gravity, it spun faster and flattened into a disk.
sentences.cn: 随着由于重力引起的星云坍缩，它旋转得越来越快，并变成了盘状。

sentences.en: He spun his car round and went after them.
He spun the revolving door round and round.
sentences.cn: 他把那个旋转门转了又转.

sentences.en: He spun the steering-wheel so that we yawed from side to side.
sentences.cn: 他急速打着舵轮，把我们搞得摇来晃去的。

sentences.en: He spun the wheel sharply and made a U turn in the middle of the road.
sentences.cn: 他猛打方向盘，在路中间掉头。

sentences.en: He straightened up slowly and spun around on the stool to face us.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢直起身子，坐在凳子上转过身来面对着我们。

sentences.en: Her skilful fingers spun the wool out to a fine thread.
sentences.cn: 她那灵巧的手指把羊毛纺成了细毛线.

sentences.en: His grandmother spun him a yarn at the fire.
sentences.cn: 他奶奶在火炉边给他讲故事.

sentences.en: I spun round to see who had spoken.
Sally spun round, a feigned look of surprise on her face.
sentences.cn: 萨莉急转过身来，脸上装出一副吃惊的表情。

sentences.en: The back wheels spun and the van spurted up the last few feet.
sentences.cn: 后轮突然转动起来，货车加速冲过了最后几英尺距离。

sentences.en: The car wheels spun and slipped on some oil on the road.
sentences.cn: 路面上有些油，汽车车轮经过时直打滑。

sentences.en: The explorer spun many fantastic tales about his adventures in the primeval forests.
sentences.cn: 那探险家杜撰了许多他在原始森林里历险的离奇故事.

sentences.en: The story is tediously spun out.

trans.tran_cn: 使…旋转( spin的过去式和过去分词 )，纺（线），杜撰，（使）急转身
